item.title: Mac系统配置炫酷终端(oh my zsh)
item.description: brew工具 官网:https://brew.sh 安装brew 1 /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 修改brew源为国内源 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 git -C "$(brew --repo)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/brew.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/core)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/homebrew-core.git git -C "$(brew --repo homebrew/cask)" remote set-url origin https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/homebrew/homebrew-cask.git export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=https://mirrors.aliyun.com/homebrew/homebrew-bottles #追加到~/.zshrc brew update #更新homebrew brew upgrade #升级所有已经安装包 brew cleanup #升级完成后清理旧版本包 iterm2 安装iterm2 1 brew cask install iterm2 配置:
